"Exterminate All Targets!": "Defeat all enemies!"
"Defeat all enemies!"
"Nyau is retreating... Wait! Its retreat is causing some sort of spacial distortion! Please, be careful!"
"Enemies have emerged. Please, I know we're asking you all to fight another battle, but we need you to intercept it."
"One of the enemies has been defeated. There's one remaining."
"Much appreciated. You have our thanks for dealing with this so well."

"Nyau got away... Wait, what? We're picking up a distortion in space from where he escaped. Watch out, something's coming!"
"Tch, what a pain. Prepare to fight, people. Drive back the hostile that just appeared!"
"That's one hostile down. One to go."
"The readings are gone. You handled that surprise attack with aplomb."

"Nyau's turning tail... Eh, h-huh?
There's something odd about the area he's escaping from... P-please, be careful!"
"A powerful enemy has arrived... We just need another push from everyone!"
"There's one enemy left! Please, don't let up now!"
"Hip hip hooray, you did it! We're not getting any more hostile readings! Thank you all so much!"

"ニャウは逃げたようです、が……
空間に歪みが発生しています。
何か、出てきますよ！"

"新たなエネミーの出現を確認。
迎撃をお願いします！"

"エネミー撃破、確認しました。
残りあと１体です、頑張りましょう！"

"皆さんのおかげで迎撃完了！
連戦、お疲れさまでした！"
